raw_comment: maybe based on the temp in some states the leaves in those states appear sooner than later. for instance the states in the south easthave leaves appering earlier the the ones in the north west.
ace_sentences: The temperature in some states may affect when leaves appear in these states.
In some states, leaves may appear sooner.
In some other states, leaves may appear later.
Some states are in the southeast.
Some states are in the northwest.
Leaves in the southeast states appear earlier than leaves in the northwest states.
